Today in Caithness, it's looking great with 4 ft @ 11s NNW swell and light 8 mph WSW winds. Spots like Point of Ness and Murkle Point are firing, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, expect similar 4 ft @ 9s NW swell but with fresh 16 mph NNE winds, making it a bit choppy. The day after, conditions improve again with 4 ft @ 11s N swell and light 5 mph WNW winds, perfect for a surf session at places like Thurso East. Best: today.
